Sustainability Report FY2021 |  2   AREAS OF FOCUS  Matthews, in accordance with the Sustainability Accounting Standard Board (“SASB”) and the Global Reporting Initiative (“GRI”), the Company has identified four (4) key areas of environmental metrics focus for its business:  • Green House Gas (“GHG”) Emissions • Energy Management • Water Management • Hazardous Waste Management  Matthews has reported on sustainability metrics in accordance with SASB and GRI since 2019 and the Company remains committed to timely reporting the metrics annually.
